channel.title: How Do I make a Client That Connects Directly To My Server?
channel.description: I need to make a client so I can make a website and then upload it onto the website so my rl friedns can connect (there legit, and they dont know what p-servers are :eek:) If anyone could help me, Id really appreciate it.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 20, 2006, 05:34:24 PM[/size][hr]I will gladly mod anyone who helps me :) :) :) :D :D :D ;) ;) ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 21, 2006, 04:20:56 PM[/size][hr]Hello?

item.title: How Do I make a Client That Connects Directly To My Server?
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

All that comes up with are rs2 based clients… aka the ones that connect to the game. Half the results dont even take place in the p-servers forums, and the 1s that do have notihng to do with making a client :|[br][size=1]Posted at: September 24, 2006, 11:38:28 AM[/size][hr]Could some link me to the tut please?

Read full topic
